authentication_page.title: Flowech - Log in to Your Account and Create a New Account
authentication_page.description: Log in and Create a New Account to your Flowech account to access phone comparisons, features, and information for various phone brands. With Flowech

login_section.title: LOG IN
login_section.forgot_password_modal_title: Fill in your email to reset password
login_section.resend_email_success_description: Please check your email for verification
login_section.send_reset_password_success_modal_descri: Please check your email for reset password

register_section.title: REGISTER
register_section.register_success_description_modal: Please check your email for verification

compare_page.title: Flowech - Phone Comparisons Features and Phone Information
compare_page.description: Flowech is a website that provides phone comparisons features and phone informations for various phone brands. Find the best phone for your needs.

title_section.mock_title_4:
You can search for phones to compare with latest information.
We have featured phones for you to compare with few steps.
title_section.mock_article1: Select the phone you want to compare.
title_section.mock_article2: You can view the list of phones being compared, remove and view reviews on youtube.
title_section.mock_article3: You can highlight a row to focus on the comparison and press the ROW button on the left to delete the highlighted row.
title_section.mock_article4: You can highlight a box to focus on the comparison and press the BOX button on the left to delete the highlighted box.
title_section.mock_article5: You can press the CLEAR button on the right to remove the currently compared device and it will be recorded as the most recent compared device. Use the PREV button to return to it.
title_section.mock_article6: You can press the PREV button to return to previously compared devices.

top_search_section.title: Most searched devices
top_search_section.description: Top 5 most searched devices on our site

search_section.title: Compare phone
search_section.sub_title_1: All information is referenced from the official website of each brand.
search_section.sub_title_2: We are currently in the development phase and will continuously add more information.

alert.duplicate_device: You have already added this device

footer.description:
Change is a journey, not a destination. 
Make each step lead to something better.

minor_navbar.logout_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
minor_navbar.logout_description: You will be redirected to the login page.
